body_html:
@Linusnie seems like this is the intended behavior:

tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/layers/layers.py

Line 1003 in 0403762

if input_rank == 3: 

    if input_rank == 3:
      layer_class = convolutional_layers.Convolution1D
    elif input_rank == 4:
      layer_class = convolutional_layers.Convolution2D
    elif input_rank == 5:
      layer_class = convolutional_layers.Convolution3D

It chooses the kind of convolution to perform based on the rank of the input tensor.
